derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as an adjective in the sense 'disjointed'): from Old French desjoint 'separated', from the verb desjoindre (see disjoin)

means.word_mean: 1. part; cease or break association with;

sentences.sentence: "She disassociated herself from the organization when she found out the identity of the president"

means.word_mean: 3. make disjoint, separated, or disconnected; undo the joining of
